name: Rise of Muscle:Demo
description:
Short 2D Side-scroller Co-op game made in Unity  for my final project of my 2nd year university

This is demo version so your experience might be short but feel free to comment our game to make this game better in positive way.

Now available in Thai language 

How to play:

P1:Move set- W=walk up A= walk left S= walk down D= walk right Fire= F button

P2:Move set- Arrow Up =walk up   Arrow Left =walk left Arrow Down =walk down Arrow right =walk right Fire= ? button

If you like our game.pls follow us on Twitter Little Duck (@LittleDuckStudi) / Twitter
